response.job_title: Civil Engineer | M.Sc. Construction | M.Sc. Management of Built Environment | Projects & Engineering Coordinator | Infrastructure & Maintenance Coordinator
response.summary:
Civil Engineer, MSc. In Construction by National University of Colombia, and MSc. In Management of Built Environment by Politecnico di Milano. Experience focused on planning, management, procurement and research in construction and educational sectors. Specialist in management of resources, personnel, materials and machinery as well as elaboration and supervision of construction budgets. Skills to plan, execute, construct, coordinate, manage and solve problems inherent to engineering projects.
Committed to business results with leadership and able to work in team and under pressure.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Coordinación de proyectos, Control de proyectos, Elaboración de presupuestos, Análisis de datos, Elaboración de informes, Revisión de documentos, Manuales de empleados, Negociación, Análisis de requisitos, Pedidos de compra, Gestión de compras, Asistencia técnica, Control de procesos, Coordinación de equipos, Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo, Elaboración de documentos, Redacción de textos académicos, Ingeniería, Educación

profile_positions.description:
Support in the elaboration of the academic product committed to "Research proposal with an international perspective, for the construction of a full‑scale model of pavement with recycled
materials" project.
1. based on the reduced‑scale model studied in "Evaluation of the behaviour of recycled and waste
materials for use in rural road infrastructure works" project support the preparation of the final technical
report of the project, in the chapters related to the physical‑mechanical modelling carried out.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineer Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Researcher in "Evaluation of the behaviour of recycled and waste materials for use in rural road
infrastructure works" project.
1. Provide support for in situ experimentation on a physical model of the pavement structure.
2. Support in the performance of control tests of quality of materials.
3. Processing and analysis of results from laboratory and field tests.
4. Preparation of research reports.
profile_positions.title: Engineer research assistant

profile_positions.description:
Coordinate the activities of design, adjustments, repairs, and maintenance of the institution's
infrastructure.
1. Coordination, programming, allocation, execution, supervision, and control of the tasks inherent to the
infrastructure process in charge.
2. Ensure the proper functioning and conservation of the movable and immovable property.
profile_positions.title: Facility coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Resident Engineer in charge of the technical control for the construction of instruction rooms, outdoor
access ramp, urban planning, and installation and start‑up of special equipment.
1. Verification of materials quality, construction processes, technical specifications, and designs.
2. Calculation of work quantities.
3. Supervision of programming and work execution.
4. Control of construction personnel.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Elaboration of operation manuals by activities and positions of the Control Tower Office.
1. Review of positions by areas of operation and activities.
2. Design and analysis of diagrams by activities for optimization of processes.
3. Capture information related to the execution of activities and processes.
4. Creation of index documents and operation guides.
profile_positions.title: E2E Process Design Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Carrying out support and consulting tasks.
1. Develop calculation reports, plans, and Hydro sanitary designs for housing buildings and commercial
areas according to specifications and regulations.
2. Review of architectural, hydro-sanitary, and structural designs.
3. Calculation of quantities of construction for housing buildings and commercial areas.
4. Elaboration of Unit Price Analysis and construction budgets for housing projects and commercial areas.
5. Review and calculation of tcalculatel surveys and drawing plans.
6. Structural modelling of housing buildings and commercial areas.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineer

profile_positions.description:
ALL BUY SAS, Colombia
In charge of purchasing materials, tools, and PPE for construction.
1. Supply materials to different works fronts according to requisitions.
2. Organize orders for each work front.
3. Realization of comparative tables according to the requested quotes.
4. Generation of purchase orders.
5. Verification of dispatches.
6. Arrival and departure of materials of the work fronts.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Assistant of Engineering in the production area.
1. Assistant of civil construction.
2. Inspector of concretes, embankments, bridges, steels, and road improvements.
3. Personnel control on the work fronts.
profile_positions.title: Technical Assistant

education.degree_name: Advanced Course for Safe Work at Heights
